statements: SELECT * FROM loyalty_data
SELECT customer_id, total_purchase_amount FROM loyalty_data
SELECT customer_id, purchase_frequency FROM loyalty_data WHERE total_purchase_amount > 100
SELECT * FROM loyalty_data WHERE purchase_frequency < 5
SELECT total_purchase_amount, customer_id FROM loyalty_data WHERE customer_id = '12345'
SELECT customer_id, total_purchase_amount, purchase_frequency FROM loyalty_data WHERE total_purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC
SELECT customer_id, purchase_frequency FROM loyalty_data ORDER BY purchase_frequency ASC
SELECT SUM(total_purchase_amount) AS total_spent FROM loyalty_data
SELECT AVG(total_purchase_amount) AS avg_purchase_amount FROM loyalty_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchase_amount > 500
SELECT customer_id, total_purchase_amount FROM loyalty_data WHERE purchase_frequency > 5 AND total_purchase_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points, purchase_frequency FROM loyalty_program WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points, purchase_frequency FROM loyalty_program WHERE purchase_frequency < 5 ORDER BY purchase_frequency;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points, purchase_frequency FROM loyalty_program JOIN rewards ON loyalty_program.customer_id = rewards.customer_id WHERE reward_amount > 50;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_frequency FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT reward_id, reward_amount FROM rewards WHERE reward_amount >= 50 ORDER BY reward_id ASC;

SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points, purchase_frequency FROM loyalty_program INNER JOIN rewards ON loyalty_program.customer_id = rewards.customer_id WHERE loyalty_points > 50 ORDER BY purchase_frequency DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_data;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount FROM loyalty_program_data ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_frequency FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE purchase_frequency > 5;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE purchase_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(purchase_amount) AS max_purchase_amount FROM loyalty_program_data;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_frequency FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM loyalty_program_data GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE reward_points >= 50 ORDER BY reward_points DESC;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT loyalty_points FROM customer_rewards WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount FROM loyalty_program_data ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, total_amount_spent FROM customer_summary WHERE total_amount_spent < 500.00;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_frequency, purchase_amount FROM loyalty_program_data;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points FROM customer_rewards WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, total_purchases, total_amount_spent FROM customer_summary WHERE total_purchases >= 10 AND total_amount_spent < 5000;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM loyalty_program_data) ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_data;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM loyalty_program_data ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_frequency FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE purchase_frequency > 5;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_amount FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE purchase_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_amount FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE reward_points > 50 ORDER BY reward_value ASC;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(loyalty_points) AS total_points FROM customer_points GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_points > 1000 ORDER BY total_points DESC;

SELECT cust.customer_name, rew.reward_name, cr.reward_date FROM customer_rewards cr JOIN loyalty_program_data cust ON cust.customer_id = cr.customer_id JOIN rewards rew ON rew.reward_id = cr.reward_id ORDER BY cr.reward_date ASC LIMIT 10;
